title: King
description: Journey & King’s Story.When Journey Williams meets the six foot five, tattooed, Max Kingston, it’s love at first sight, but it doesn’t last long before she meets the real ‘King’ - badass member of the Satan’s Assassins Motorcycle Club. Journey’s Demons from her past, and her new career as a corrections officer at a local prison have her jumping into her Dodge Challenger and never looking back. For the past three years she has managed to squelch the attraction she felt for him, knowing it could never work. That is, until her jail got a new intake of prisoners.King has been living the life of a sexy bachelor for the last decade. As sergeant-at-arms in the Satan’s Assassin’s MC, he’s never had to worry about finding women. In fact, he rarely has time for them. That all changes when he meets a beautiful woman in a slinky red dress outside of the courthouse. King can kill a man with his bare hands, and never think twice about it, but when she leaves him without so much as a name, he can’t help but wonder what happened to her.
author: Shannon Callahan
